aircraft.value: Chimera Multi - AC-3676-430 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 13/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 15/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 17/02/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 16/02/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 20/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
